com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.base

Interface DynamicTextWidget

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DynamicWidget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicBottomNavigationView, DynamicTabLayout, DynamicToolbar

    public interface DynamicTextWidget
extends DynamicWidget
    Interface to create dynamic widgets with a text view which can be tinted according to the DynamicTheme.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getTextColor() 
      int getTextColorType() 
      void setTextColor()
      Set text color of this view according to the supplied values.
      void setTextColor(int textColor)
      Set the value of text color for this view.
      void setTextColorType(int textColorType)
      Set the text color type to this view.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.base.DynamicWidget

        getColor, getColorType, getContrastWithColor, getContrastWithColorType, initialize, isBackgroundAware, loadFromAttributes, setBackgroundAware, setColor, setColor, setColorType, setContrastWithColor, setContrastWithColorType, setEnabled

    • Method Detail

      • getTextColorType

        int getTextColorType()
        Returns:
        The text color type applied to this view.
        See Also:
        DynamicColorType

      • setTextColorType

        void setTextColorType(int textColorType)
        Set the text color type to this view.
        Parameters:
        textColorType - Text color type for this view.
        See Also:
        DynamicColorType

      • getTextColor

        int getTextColor()
        Returns:
        The value of text color applied to this view.

      • setTextColor

        void setTextColor(int textColor)
        Set the value of text color for this view.
        Parameters:
        textColor - Text color for this view.

      • setTextColor

        void setTextColor()
        Set text color of this view according to the supplied values. Generally, it should be a tint color so that text will be visible on this view background.
